entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:55 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
